akn:section.akn:heading: Cooperative program on research, development, and demonstration of technology regarding nuclear or r

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Program required The Administrator for Nuclear Security shall carry out with the Russian Federation a cooperative program on the research, development, and demonstration of technologies for protection from and response to nuclear or radiological terrorism.
